item.title: What is a good manager?
item.description: It is hard to do science without proper definitions. So what is a manager? Abstracting from (Horstman 2016), my definition of a manager is the following: A manager balances present output with creating the conditions of future output. Figure 1: The Good Sheperd, emblem found in a Roman catacomb, sec III As one can see, this definition is the same as the one for an investor. That is correct.

item.title: Is chatGPT replacing you? or: The nature of the intellectual act
item.description: I have come across people claiming to fear being replaced by bots, specially chatGPT and other large language models (LLM).
